# UITabBarItemAppearance.Style

**Enumeration**

Constants indicating the layout of a tab bar item’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

A tab bar adjusts the layout of each item’s icon and title string based on the current trait environment and other factors.

## Item layout

- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.stacked**: A vertically stacked icon and title.
- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.inline**: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in regular-width environments.
- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.compactInline**: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Resetting the appearance properties

- **configureWithDefault(for:)**: Configures the tab bar item appearance object with appropriate values for the specified style.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
